title: Poor Ping MS Over Past Two Weeks
body: For around two weeks now, my ping has been 10 ms higher than usual. I  live in Michigan and would get consistent 23 ping, and now my ping is around 34 when playing League. It's a consistent ping, there isn't fluctuation, but I was wondering if there was any reason for this increase in MS or a way to fix it. I have Comcast as a provider, and as far as I'm aware they don't do any connection throttling with all the recent net neutrality hubbub.

replies.body: Your ISP's routing to the game server may have changed or struggling, but we can get a traceroute to get more details.  Download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a route to: 104.160.131.1.  Run it for 5 minutes, replace the IP address with dashes on the first two rows only, and let me know what you find.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Kd46pmi9,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-12-13T17:45:53.042+0000)
